OpenAIChat_API_KEY_LABEL_description: You can create a new API key via https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
OpenAIChat_CHAT_MODEL_LABEL_description: The Open AI chat model to use. The default value is "gpt-3.5-turbo".
OpenAIChat_ORG_LABEL_description: An optional field to specify the organization id that this chat pertains to.
OpenAIChat_MAX_TOKENS_LABEL_description: The maximum number of tokens per request from the OpenAI chat model. 100 tokens ~= 75 words. You can visit this link for more info about tokens: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936856-what-are-tokens-and-how-to-count-them
OpenAIChat_HELP_description: Customizable message used for fetching documentation and/or help pages using command `/chatgpt-help`.
OpenAIChat_TEMPERATURE_LABEL_description: The temperature setting controls how creative the OpenAI chat model can be by adjusting the randomness of its responses. The value of temperature ranges from 0 to 1, with a default of 1.
OpenAIChat_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_INSTRUCTION_LA: System Instruction (how the ChatGPT should behave)

This field is used to give specific instructions to the AI language model about how it should behave when generating responses. You can use it to set certain guidelines or rules for the conversation such as topics to avoid, preferred formatting or tone, or requests for specific types of responses.
OpenAIChat_ENABLE_REACTION_description: Add reaction to message when bot is working on the response
OpenAIChat_ENABLE_MENTION_description: Allow the bot to respond when mentioned in a message thread
OpenAIChat_ENABLE_IN_PRIVATE_ROOM_descri: Allow the bot to respond when mentioned in a private room
